      • calculateReward

        double calculateReward(IEnvironment env,
                       IGraphState s1,
                       IGraphAction a1)
        Calculates a rewarding score (0.0 .. 1.0), which determines how interesting is the state' action.
        Parameters:
        Graph - environment.
        state - A graph state.
        action - A graph action from the state.
        Returns:
        A rewarding score between 0.0 (no interest at all) and 1.0 (maximum interest).
